categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic planets

nodes.text: Fest was a planet located within the Atrivis sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories that was the home to a human population.

At some point, Fest was savaged by the Galactic Empire. During the Galactic Civil War, Fest served as an Alliance to Restore the Republic regional headquarters and operations sector. Fest was included in a map of the galaxy that listed safe worlds, starfighter hubs at level five or higher, regional headquarters and operations sectors, and deep space caches.
